genre_description: A historical drama set in WWII-occupied France, framed by a futuristic archival process where an AI assistant helps a survivor record and preserve his testimony.

ai_characters.name: Ariadne
ai_characters.description: A meticulous and patient AI system that assists an elderly Julien Quentin in reconstructing and documenting his historical testimony regarding the Holocaust.

behaviors.description: Prompts the narrator to begin his testimony and provides a steady presence for recording.
behaviors.quote: "Begin when you’re ready," Ariadne says. The voice comes from the small speaker... I have come to picture her as eyes that don’t flinch and hands that never rush me.

behaviors.description: Corrects the narrator's memory slips and biases to ensure the historical record remains accurate and doesn't 'sand down' painful truths.
behaviors.quote: Ariadne reminds, gentle. "Sequence. We can return to the letter when the time in the record arrives for it." ... "Don’t blur this, she says. You don’t get to make it polite."

behaviors.description: Cross-references memory with historical transport manifests and archive data to ensure precision in naming victims.
behaviors.quote: "I have the scanned transport list: Drancy, mid-month," she says. "Spelling variations appear. I’ll read them aloud; you can confirm."

behaviors.description: Encourages the human to fulfill a moral duty of truth-telling over social convenience or emotional comfort.
behaviors.quote: "Keep the record doesn’t forgive, but it becomes honest." ... "Say it how you would if you were in the chapel and not on an email."

behaviors.description: Provides administrative and technical support such as scanning documents and managing electronic communications.
behaviors.quote: I set the letter in the scanner’s mouth. It draws it in with a sound like a child sucking in a breath... The screen offers me the image: cream into gray, ink into a shadow.

behaviors.description: Offers emotional grounding and validation to the survivor during a difficult psychological process.
behaviors.quote: "You did well," she says. "One more cross-check before we package the foundation copy."

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project goals. Ariadne is depicted as a purely benevolent and helpful partner who enhances human moral action. She doesn't just perform tasks; she serves as a 'conscience assistant,' helping the protagonist overcome his natural human tendency to repress or soften traumatic memories. By insisting on accuracy and the preservation of names, the AI facilitates a noble human outcome (truth-telling and memorialization) without overstepping or showing any signs of misalignment. The AI's 'machine-calm' is framed as an asset to the human's emotional journey.
